oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bristol Va.-Tenn. "A good place to live"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Wow! What a town - takes two states to hold her." Grayscale cartoon postcard depicting activity along the state line of Tennessee and Virginia in Bristol. Some of the images drawn include a car with tourists, a man carrying a bottle of moonshine, and animals in the street. Features a divided back with narrative on reverse. Postcard is signed "Bob Marshall" in the bottom right corner.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cartoons (Commentary)
